hero.title: BUSINESS KEÑES
hero.kicker: Strategic Advisory for Businesses and Investors
hero.desc: We help founders find investors, explore new markets, and influence government policy.

about.title: About us
about.lead: We advise ambitious start-ups and experienced entrepreneurs in Kazakhstan who have created a unique product or service and are seeking new markets, potential investors, as well as state support and promotion of their interests in government policies.

principles.quote: Trust and Reputation Worth More than Money

aray.name: Ms. Aray Kasabekova
aray.bio: Trade negotiator with 20 years in Kazakhstan’s Government. Led WTO accession and key regional/economic agreement negotiations; represented Kazakhstan at WTO, UNCTAD and ISO in Geneva (2016–2019).

marius.name: Mr. Marius Bordalba
marius.bio: Spanish lawyer with 27+ years advising companies and governments on trade and customs (WTO Secretariat alumnus). Expertise: trade remedies, sanctions, customs origin/classification, arbitration (ICC), forming consortia and drafting technical offers.

roman.name: Mr. Roman Romashkin
roman.bio: An expert with 20 years of experience in trade, economic integration, food security, and agriculture. He has taught and conducted research at Moscow State University for over 15 years and participated in projects with the World Bank, OECD, EU, OXFAM, IFPRI, ICTSD, and UNCTAD/WTO.

saltanat.name: Ms. Saltanat Jambylbek
saltanat.bio: A lawyer with 15 years of experience in corporate, labor, and business law, advising clients on corporate and regulatory matters in Kazakhstan. He has extensive expertise in contracts and legal documentation, with experience at KazTransGas, Nazarbayev University, and the Astana International Financial Center.

darkhan.name: Mr. Darkhan Seitkazin
darkhan.bio: Innovation specialist with 10 years experience in World Bank innovation projects, technology commercialization and policy design. Experienced in market promotion of tech projects; fluent in English and German.

aizhan.name: Ms. Aizhan Kasabekova
aizhan.bio: Accountant with 19 years in major private & public companies (telecom, aviation, construction). Served as chief and deputy chief accountant across multiple national enterprises and audit firms.

madi.name: Mr. Madi Kassabekov
madi.bio: Expert with 10+ years in multimodal transport strategy (Expo Dubai 2020, KTZ Express, major oil & logistics firms). Asia-Pacific winner, runner-up FIATA Young International Freight Forwarder of the Year 2015.

card1.title: BUSINESS KEÑES joins USAID TPSP Initiative
card1.text: BUSINESS KEÑES is included into the list of consultants of the USAID Central Asia Trade Program’s TPSP Initiative

card2.title: Kazakhstan Oil & Fat Industry Report
card2.text: The Status, Challenges, and Prospects of Kazakhstan's Oil and Fat Industry in the Context of Eurasian Integration

card3.title: Eurasian Agro-Logistics and Transport Corridors
card3.text: International Transport Corridors and Prospects for the Export-Import Agro-Logistics Ecosystem in Russia

footer.lead: Built to evolve – flexible solutions for unstoppable business growth.

services.title: Our Services
services.intro: BUSINESS KEÑES is a consulting partner that helps your business reach the next level of growth.
services.note: We provide both one-off consultations and ongoing (retainer) support:

forCompanies.title: For Kazakhstani companies
items: Promoting interests and negotiating with government agencies
Protecting company interests at the Eurasian Economic Commission in the context of EAEU and WTO membership
Business negotiations and correspondence with foreign partners; arranging overseas trips to find partners

funding.title: Finding investors, obtaining financing and grants
items: Analysis of Kazakhstan's and foreign markets
Business strategy development
Support in searching for potential investors
Preparation of investor documentation

forInvestors.title: For potential investors
items: Analysis of Kazakhstan’s market and preliminary due diligence
Organization of business events and trips across Kazakhstan
Representation in Kazakhstan and interaction with government agencies
Development of market-entry and growth strategies

forExporters.title: For exporters
items: Market analysis and export strategy
Protection of trade interests and cooperation with government bodies
Certification and trademark registration abroad
Search for foreign partners
Logistics and calculation of transport costs
Supply-chain and route optimization

other.title: Other services for your business
items: Logistics services: multimodal, international
Accounting: tax and statistical reporting, financial reporting, e-invoices, temporary storage warehouses
Legal support for international contracts
Preparation of tendering documentation
Preparation of documents for obtaining loans

services.closing: We are your bridge to doing business in Kazakhstan.
